__e: Because an enemy of King Arthur is probably a friend of mine.
Nothing she told me about Arturo was true.
Arturo is our friend, right or wrong.
Instead of standing there, do me a favor. Call Arturo and tell him I'm not working today.
He's free to play his part in Arthur's death and there is nothing I can do to prevent it.
What if this is just another one of my crazy King Arthur dreams, and in two minutes, I wake up in my bedroom?
